title: Igebotz
author: Igebotz
created_time: January 05, 2023, 09:42:46 AMLast edit: June 02, 2023, 12:57:17 AM by Igebotz
content: I sent a message to the admins (theymos & Cyrus) a few days ago requesting a username change for a few private reasons we discussed, and I'm glad I got a quick response from Cyrus to make this happen. Igehhh was more than just a username; it was a brand that needed to be safeguarded. I've officially changed the name on all of my Brand documents, both online and offline, and I'd like to use this medium to state that all outstanding bets, legal contracts, Pool and feedback remain valid. I am now officially Igebotz. Thank you theymos & Cyrus.This is my only official address bc1qh3r40vwu4c5hjgjjscyjdyd02vd39g3glu3chx and if needs be for another break from the forum i must sign a message from this account. ( my kids have access to my wallet and if i pass away i expect one of them to continue with this account its a family assets )The email link to this account is nbxxkxxlebxri2x2x@gmail.com ( this is subject to change every 2- 3 years)Password:This i change it whenever i feel the needs for new one.Every posts linked to igehhh remains invalid( subject to deletion every year) excepts outstanding deals.My reputation and forum contributionIgebotz will never scam you, I'm trusted If you must deal with me, please click on the TG link in my bio or send me a PM because there are many fake TG accounts impersonating me.Happy New Year! Best regards Igebotz

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Igebotz on January 05, 2023, 09:42:46 AMI sent a message to the admins (theymos & Cyrus) a few days ago requesting a username change for a few private reasons we discussed, and I'm glad I got a quick response from Cyrus to make this happen. Igehhh was more than just a username; it was a brand that needed to be safeguarded. I've officially changed the name on all of my Brand documents, both online and offline, and I'd like to use this medium to state that all outstanding bets, legal contracts, Pool and feedback remain valid. I am now officially Igebotz. Thank you theymos & Cyrus If you must deal with me, please click on the TG link in my bio or send me a PM because there are many fake TG accounts impersonating me.Happy New Year! Best regards IgebotzÂ  Congrats for such a fast name change!Is it OK for you if I add you a neutral trust feedback stating the name change?I think it's better, in case some people miss this topic.

comments.author: NdaMk
comments.body: Congratulations Mr Ige, this switch of name went easy compare to others maybe Theymos and Cyrus are still in their holiday spirit, generous from them. Quote from: NeuroticFish on January 05, 2023, 09:46:48 AMIs it OK for you if I add you a neutral trust feedback stating the name change?I think it's better, in case some people miss this topic.It seems OK to me for at least till other forum members get familiarised with it.
